sys_script.name: Set data to approval table

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_2c2784778393021020fac310feaad33b
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>false</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>x_1107936_tech_sup_tech_sup</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition table="x_1107936_tech_sup_tech_sup">support_type=Request^ORrequested_forVALCHANGES^EQ<item display_value="Request" endquery="false" field="support_type" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value="Request"/><item endquery="false" field="requested_for" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="VALCHANGES" or="true" value=""/><item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/></filter_condition><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Set data to approval table</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/ ) {

    var requiredApproval = 'requested';
    current.approval = requiredApproval;
    current.update();
    var managerSysId = '';
    // Get line manager sys_id
    var user = new GlideRecord('sys_user');
    user.addQuery('sys_id', current.requested_for);
    user.query();
    if (user.next()) {
        managerSysId = user.manager;
    }
    // Delete previous records
    var gr = new GlideRecord('sysapproval_approver');
    gr.addQuery('document_id', current.sys_id);
    // gr.addQuery('approver', managerSysId);
    gr.query();
    while (gr.next()) {
        gr.deleteRecord();
    }
    // Add new record
    var approval = new GlideRecord('sysapproval_approver');
    approval.initialize();
    approval.sysapproval = current.sys_id;
    approval.document_id = current.sys_id;
    approval.source_table = 'x_1107936_tech_sup_tech_sup';
    approval.approver = managerSysId;
    approval.state = requiredApproval;
    approval.insert();

})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-07-16 10:15:34</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>2c2784778393021020fac310feaad33b</sys_id><sys_mod_count>12</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Set data to approval table</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Tech Support" source="x_1107936_tech_sup">0f5a2aa347130210dc849530116d430c</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Tech Support">0f5a2aa347130210dc849530116d430c</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_2c2784778393021020fac310feaad33b</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-07-18 04:53:44</sys_updated_on><template/><when>after</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=2c2784778393021020fac310feaad33b"/></record_update>
